data.text: @clv_clive Hi Roman, your request has already been forwarded to our responsible department. We ask for your understanding that due to the high volume of requests, it is not possible to process all of them within the usual time limits. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@AlmaKH9 [2/2] Wir können dir versichern, dass wir in vollem Einsatz sind und wir alles tun, damit wir dir rasch wieder unser gewohntes Service bieten können. Können wir dir noch irgendwie weiterhelfen?  Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@AlmaKH9 [1/2] Hi Alma, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Wir haben aktuell sehr viele Anrufe und unsere Fluggäste benötigen auch mehr Zeit für ihre Anliegen. Natürlich wollen wir uns auch für jeden Passagier die Zeit nehmen, die er braucht.
@MajdAbosamha Hi Majd, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@Sheldrake Hi, then please use this e-mail address instead impressum@austrian.com
@degibson2020 Hi Daniel, the previously mentioned e-mail address is still valid and in use. Kind regards, Daphne
@aathans Hi Athanasios, we sent you the form via DM. Kind regards, Daphne
@oratory1990 Hi, since your baggage is now lost for a week now please contact our colleagues at CentralBaggage.Tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

@Clarissimata HI Classandra, es tut uns leid, dass du uns telefonisch nicht erreichen kannst, leider sind moimentan alle unsere Kanäle überlastet. Wir können dich hier nur bitten es etwas später erneut zu versuchen. Danke für deine Geduld. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@Ruba_H_ Hi Ruba, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@Sheldrake Hi Philip, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/QI0fSSoknS Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @frdrcvf Hi Frederico, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@Thetrut57789172 Hi, aufgrund der momentanen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und wir entschuldigen uns für die verspätete Antwort. Können wir dir noch irgendwie weiterhelfen? Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@ListenToDamien Hi Damien, wir möchten uns für die Aussage bei dir entschuldigen. Wenn dein Gepäck nicht innerhalb von fünf Tagen gefunden wird, sende bitte das ausgefüllte Baggage Questionnaire Formular an vielzos@austrian.com. https://t.co/o3XIOQmXHr. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@sty0pa Hi there, please mind that the last operating carrier of your trip is responsible in case of a baggage delay. If the last leg of your trip has been operated by Aegean, we can only ask you to contact them directly for any further information. Kind regards, Chris
@aathans Hi Athanasios, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything that we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@Mrymkwsr Hi Maryam, we are sorry to hear about your experience so far and can only apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/dAXMVijisj Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @CVDettmar Hi, all forgotten items are handed over to the Airport's Lost & Found department by the cleaning crew and are not taken care of by our own staff. Therefore we kindly ask you to get in contact with the Lost Property Office at Chicago Airport. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@oratory1990 [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn

@oratory1990 [1/2]
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@FaceShilla [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn

@FaceShilla [1/2]
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@BenHall87 [2/2]  Further info can be found via the following link: https://t.co/4dlwXTWrei
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Preparing for your trip with the family
urls.description: Lay the foundations of a relaxed flight before embarking on your journey. Prepare for your trip together with your family.

data.text:
@BenHall87 [1/2] Hi there, 
Thank you for getting in touch. For your journey, you can either bring a buggy or a child seat, which is free of charge. If you want to bring both items, one has definitely to be paid, as you are exceeding your allowance.

Wir möchten uns für die Umstände entschuldigen. Bitte sende uns den Buchungscode als PM, damit wir dir an dieser Stelle weiterhelfen können.

data.text: @upquark2  Hi there,  how can we help you? Please send us your booking code as PM, so we can take a closer look. Best regards, Denis

@amitavo Hi Amit, I'm sorry that you're still missing your bag. Have you filed a claim at the airport? If yes, you should have received a PIR-Number which will allow you to trace your baggage via: https://t.co/wrOEzpgJOn
Best regards, Denis
@twitjawy Hi, please use the respective online form that can be found via this link: https://t.co/62YZ6n224l Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @AlisonWard21 Hi alison, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane

@levitaet Hi, your messages have been received and will be processed by the relevant department. As there is some time until your flight, please contact us again if you have not heard back within a week. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@Lalec509 Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any baggage claims. Please refer to the contact on your PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@butiregress [1/2] Hi there, I'm sorry that you're still missing your bag. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR)
@irismaenza Hi Iris, I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight cancellation. I just replied to your private message. Best regards, Denis

@degibson2020 Hi Daniel, unfortunately, we the Social Media Team can´t assist you with lost baggage. Please contact the number shown on your lost report or you can either send an email to viellos@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya
@x245m  Hi, we are currently experiencing an airport staff shortage, which affects some ground handling services. Best regards, Denis

@joshhead [2/2] only they will be able to provide you with the current status, you may also track the status online: https://t.co/wrOEzpgJOn
 Best regards, Denis

@joshhead [1/2] Hi Josh, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to the baggage system and can't provide you with any updates. The correct contact is the number on your lost report,
@arshak Hi Arshak, we are sorry to read that you couldn´t reach out to us by phone. Please write us your inquiry in a DM including the booking code. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@geraldgru Hi Gerald, es tut uns leid, dass du von einer Flugunregelmäßigkeit betroffen bist. Bitte entschuldige die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten. Gibt es noch etwas womit wir dir behilflich sein können? Liebe Grüße, Derya
@arpaw0cky Hi Stuart, I've just replied to your DMs. Best regards, Christiane
@evehearts Hi Eva, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@grnbayhusker Hi Justin, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@_lovelydenisex3 [2/2] Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya

@_lovelydenisex3 [1/2] Hi D, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Unfortunately, we- the Social media Team- have no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.
@patto97645555 Hi Patto, I've just replied to your DMs. Best regards, Christiane
@patto97645555 Hi Patto, I've just replied to your DMs .Best regards, Christiane

@lioncamer Hi, bitte schicke deine Anfrage an viellos@austrian.com. Da unsere KollegInnen jedoch ein erhöhtes Volumen an Anfragen derzeit, haben kann es zu längeren Wartezeiten bei der Rückmeldung kommen. Wir bitten dich um Geduld. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@oliverbzz Hi Olivier, we're sorry for that. All our channels are very busy currently. If there's still anything we can assist you with please be specific and send us your booking reference and/or your ticket number in a DM. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@noninic1990 @sasairlines [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn

@noninic1990 @sasairlines [1/2]
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@jakobmaul Hi Jakub, 
Es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und es kann zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @nachotali  Dear Tali, thanks for your message and we sincerely apologise for any inconvenience experienced. Please provide us your booking reference or ticket number via PM in order to be assisted accordingly. Kind regards, Denis

@EVERSORIS1 Hi, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. All our channels are very busy so getting back to you takes time. If you still need assistance, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@butschinek Hi HoBu, es tut uns leid, dass du von einer Stornierung betroffen wurdest. Falls du inzwischen noch nicht umgebucht wurdest, schicke uns bitte eine PN mit deiner Buchungscode. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@rubyslprlawgirl Hi there, you can book your preferred seat at the same time as the ticket purchase up to a year before departure, or at a later date up to 48 hours before departure directly  on https://t.co/D0B55USJbx  Best regards, Denis
@gatoxxerran Hi Xerran, I just answered you via PM. Best regards, Denis

@Murrayator @HeathrowAirport @IRONMANtri Once your luggage has been located our colleagues will contact you. Unfortunately, there are currently European-wide delays in luggage loading and tracing. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

data.text:
@annagreathead Hi Anna, thanks for your message! I was not able to retrieve any reservation with this booking code. This booking is not active, please delete the Email.
Best regards, Denis
@erikello [2/2] In order to submit a complaint please use the following link https://t.co/UOxa5dIBVe. We hope your future flights with us will run out smoother. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @erikello [1/2]Hi Enrico, we are sorry to hear you had reason to complain and your journey was accompanied by inconvenient circumstances. Please accept my sincere apologies.
@medino92 Hi Dino, I just answered to you via private massage. Best regards, Denis

@TonCatacrak Hi Ton, thank you for reaching out. Currently, we are receiving an enormous number of inquiries. Therefore the refund process will need longer than usual. Rest assured that our colleagues do their best to process all inquiries as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya
@SNKSSNKS2 @bookingcom Hallo, es tut uns leid, dass du von einer Flugunregelmäßigkeit betroffen warst. Konnte dir in der Zwischenzeit geholfen werden? LG, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @jackdavid_l Hi Jack, well it sounds like you are trying to log in and not creating a new account. However, it is not mandatory to create an account to book flights with us. Kind regards, Derya

@sty0pa Hi, I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@BeataGorecka Hi Beata, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@svhenri [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn

@svhenri [1/2]
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @RHammoudeh Hi Rahaf, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@kevinprak Hi Kevin, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. You can also check the status of your reservation anytime on our homepage via "My Bookings" Kind regards, Chris

@rstapley74 Hi Rob, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@lioncamer Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Koffer nicht mit dir angekommen ist. Bitte kontakitere unsere KollegInnen über die Nummer auf deinem Missing Luggage Report, da wir, das Social Media Team, leider keinen Zugang zum Gepäckssystem haben. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@GutuTaffy Hi Taffy, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@MadhurendraMalu @EASA [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn

@AnitaY21 Hi Anita, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@amitavo Hi Amit, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight cancellation. Kindly note that if you have incurred any expenses during the delay you may apply for compensation via the following link: 
https://t.co/lQ0BbSodym
Kind Regards, Alessandra
